name: Just a LOTTO
description: $LOTTO combines viral meme culture with solid tokenomics, ensuring that our community grows in both numbers and value. This is a meme coin that doesn’t just aim to entertain—it’s here to win! On the surface, $LOTTO may appear as yet another meme coin… But is it though!? NFT’s will become your ticket to an assortment of giveaways. The community driven coin’s focal point, is to uplift, inspire, encourage, and even motivate all Future #LottoBallers!
